successes.title: The Kick - a pocket sized lighting studio for photo & video
successes.description: We designed the Kick to help you take better pictures, make better videos and have fun doing it.

Pledges.description: Thank you! You will have your name listed on the Rift Labs website as a backer. Every dollar counts!
Get a Kick laptop sticker saying "I'm a Backer" and your name listed on the Rift Labs website.  Every dollar counts!
